channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 13:50 Return the threat of a shelling in Marganets and Manganese Territorial Community. Salt for further messages.
item.description: 🟢 13:50 Return the threat of a shelling in Marganets and Manganese Territorial Community. Salt for further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟠 13:34 Attack Drones-Camikadzethip Prayer
item.description: 🟠 13:34 Attack Drones-Camikadzethip Prayer This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 13:34 The threat of shelling! Now in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery Fire.
item.description: 🔴 13:34 The threat of shelling! Now in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery Fire. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 13:06 Flashing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 13:06 Flashing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community#Dnepropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 13:04 Alarm to the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lapetskaya Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 13:04 Alarm to the Kharkiv region.
